original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: ▁dvīhi ▁bhikkhave ▁dhammehi ▁samannāgato ▁bhikkhu ▁diṭṭh eva ▁dhamme ▁dukkhaṃ ▁viharati ▁sa vi ghāt aṃ ▁sa u pāyās aṃ ▁s apariḷāh aṃ

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
Indriyesu aguttadvāratāya ca, bhojane amattaññutāya ca.
analyzed: ▁indriy esu ▁a gutt advāra tāya ▁ca ▁bhojan e ▁ amatt aññu tāya ▁ca

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: ▁imehi ▁kho ▁bhikkhave ▁dvīhi ▁dhammehi ▁samannāgato ▁bhikkhu ▁diṭṭh eva ▁dhamme ▁dukkhaṃ ▁viharati ▁sa vi ghāt aṃ ▁sa u pāyās aṃ ▁s apariḷāh aṃ

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
